## Description
This PR implements a fix to Apple Sign-In, patches missing auth user data, updates `app.json` to allow Apple authentication, and corrects UI issues in the Dashboard & Audit screen.

---

### Types of changes

Fill in the box with "x" for each that applies to the kind of changes you made

[ ] New feature (non-breaking change which adds functionality)
